mapper.select: /*select count(*) from tbl_student join student_paper on tbl_student.student_id=student_paper.student_id where tbl_student.student_id=20180001 and state=0*/ select count(*) from tbl_student join student_paper on tbl_student.student_id=student_paper.student_id join tbl_paper on student_paper.paper_id=tbl_paper.paper_id where tbl_student.student_id=#{studentId} and state=0 and tbl_paper.paper_endTime>#{newDate}

select tbl_paper.paper_id as paperId,tbl_paper.paper_name as paperName,tbl_paper.paper_startTime as paperStartTime,tbl_paper.paper_endTime as paperEndTime,tbl_manage.manage_name as manage,student_paper.state as state from tbl_paper join student_paper on tbl_paper.paper_id=student_paper.paper_id join tbl_manage on tbl_paper.paper_createBy=tbl_manage.manage_id where student_paper.student_id=#{studentId} order by student_paper.state asc,tbl_paper.paper_endTime desc
select * from tbl_question where question_id in (SELECT question_id from `paper-question` where paper_id=#{id})

select mistake_id as mistakeId,tbl_question.question_topic,tbl_question.question_A,tbl_question.question_B,tbl_question.question_C,tbl_question.question_D,tbl_question.answer from tbl_mistake join tbl_question on tbl_mistake.question_id=tbl_question.question_id where tbl_mistake.student_id=#{studentId}
mapper.update: update tbl_student set student_evaluation=#{context} where student_id=#{studentId}
